title: Thunderbird email archiving
content: Thunderbird randomly archives a significant percentage of my emails. I would like to stop that and control which email is archived. Is there a way to accomplish this? Thanks.

title: thunderbird access
content: thunderbird doesn't recognise (I'm australian we don't use z's anymore) my password and keeps on wanting me to enter a new one I enter every password I have had in the last 32 years at least and still no then all of a sudden it sends a message. I reuse that password and it won't accept it.

title: How to set thunderbird to delete e-mail from server when, and only when, I delete it locally on my thunderbird laptop
content:
I want to set thunderbird to delete e-mail from my server when, and only when, I delete it locally on my thunderbird on my laptop. I believe I used to do this in account settings, but now it seems that all I find in option to save e-mail on the server is an option to leave messages for "X" number of days, OR until I delete them... which is what I want except I think it used to mean that when I delete them locally, they would automagically delete on the server, also. Now it seems to mean until I specifically delete each of them ON THE SERVER, which is a pain to have to go through deleting e-mails twice, once locally and once again on the server... I believe there must be some setting I am missing, as I believe I used to have it set up the way I'm asking for, but it is not working now. 

 I noticed this by having more than 12,000 e-mails on my server and about 90% of them should be erased already...    sad to have to go through them all again   =(

What setting to check? What to do ?? ( I did attempt the "compact folders" option that chatgpt suggested, but chatgpt only has access to older versions of the directions, and this is a new issue ) ( another option that seems to exist is to delete all of them in process of downloading them onto my laptop, but I do want to save some of them in both places ) In case it makes a difference, my server is at my webhosting site, it is not an e-mail service like gmail or yahoo. It is at my website on server hostpoint.ch thanks for any direction you can give me! Thanks for being there! Tom
creator: thomas422

title: Google Account Varification
content: I spent several hours attempting to re-install Thunderbird today on my new Linux Machine....the Google Verification was/is TERRIBLE...IT NEVER...NEVER WORKED...it has the wrong telephone number, it only occasionally sent CODES, and I attempted to get through this BS...processes at least five or six times..
creator: r.gerou1946
